channel.title: Bot for a RSPS?
channel.description:
This may seem REALLY pathetic, but I am in need of a simple RSPS bot. The only thing I would need it for is something like this:
Use item (526) on object (409) Use object(2213) take item (526) and repeat.
I'm not going to use this, one of my friends wanted me to find something like this for him while he was on vacation.

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“SCAR_, post:25, topic:361097”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=457385.msg3360456#msg3360456 date=1286314995]
l2scar?
[/quote]

Since Scar is outdate the replica SIMBA would be more appropriate, which is developed by moparisthebest himself. It also comes with much more features than SCAR and is still in the process of development! http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/simba/current/[/quote]
Simba isn’t developed by mitb…

Read full topic

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Cba to read all the posts so I don’t know if someone has stated this but… moparscape 3.2 had aryan built into it, and aryan is a bot. with a little knowledge (almost none) you could rip aryan from that and apply it to any client.

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“RoidScape.Darkbb, post:19, topic:361097”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=457385.msg3350652#msg3350652 date=1285280742]

Why would you waste your time botting on an RSPS?

They’re lazy fucks.

I bet this is the only reason you have internet. You don’t need to insult people over the internet. The use of it would be solely for education purposes. Using your logic, anyone who uses a RSPS is lazy, because they can’t train their skills on RuneScape, and have to make a server just to feel self achieved.
Of course, that isn’t right. I believed most of the RSPS’s on this website are for educational purposes.
[/quote]

me personally made a rsps base and client and webclient out of scratch because i wanted to learn more about java and html and didnt want to pay for a class[/quote]

from scratch you say…

http://www.moparisthebest.com/origrs2/ ???

Read full topic

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Ace., post:6, topic:361097”]Correct, something like Ghost Mouse where you simply record the method once, and let it repeat. As simple as that.

But to my knowledge, there is currently isn’t a bot like RSBot - for private servers.[/quote]

I’m not looking for anything snazzy with all the scripts and stuff, just a little program that works, in a way, like cheat engine, where you would type in some ID’s, and let it run by itself. But I’ll try and find one of those mouse bots. Thanks though

Read full topic

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?

item.description:

The closest you’ll get to botting on an RSPS is using a simple macroer, I’m not aware of any RSPS bots.

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

Correct, something like Ghost Mouse where you simply record the method once, and let it repeat. As simple as that.

But to my knowledge, there is currently isn’t a bot like RSBot - for private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Bot for a RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Destruction, post:4, topic:361097”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=457385.msg3347750#msg3347750 date=1284950285]

[quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=457385.msg3347394#msg3347394 date=1284932283]I’m not going to use this, one of my friends wanted me to find something like this for him while he was on vacation.

Lol lies. It’s just like saying, “My friend needs relationship advice,”. Idiot.
[/quote]
Nice trolling, fucking flamer. Is it strange that people can ACTUALLY HAVE FRIENDS?
P.S. I wouldn’t be scared to say it was mine, it’s not.
[/quote]

Mhm sure. You think calling somebody an idiot is flaming? You’re an idiot.[/quote]Uuh… Calling someone an idiot is flaming. Basically when you flame you’re insulting the other person. Last time I checked, calling someone an idiot is an insult.

At the topic: With what you need, just do the old-fashioned thing and use a regular mouse macro, one that can record paths.

Read full topic
